name: test-wasm-calling-ts-function
description: Test wasm calling a TypeScript function
author: Wink Saville <wink@saville.com>

scripts.add:nodev8: rm -rf nodev8 && mkdir nodev8 && curl https://nodejs.org/download/nightly/v8.0.0-nightly20170406a94a5da78c/node-v8.0.0-nightly20170406a94a5da78c-linux-x64.tar.xz -s -o node-v8.tar.xz && tar -xJf node-v8.tar.xz -C nodev8 --strip-components 1 && rm node-v8.tar.xz
